tree.name: Koby Brea
tree.tradeDescription: 7-team trade: Suns received Brea (2025 #41 pick), Green, Brooks, Maluach, Fleming, picks from Rockets for Durant
tree.note: Kentucky guard, acquired as 2025 #41 pick in Durant trade

assetsGivenUp.note: 2x NBA Finals MVP, acquired from Brooklyn via trade
